definition: awe-inspiring/abbr. for 赫茲|赫兹[he4 zi1], hertz (Hz)
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat

sentences.english: And character, in the words of Heraclitus, determines fate.
sentences.chinese: 赫拉克利特曾經說過，性格決定命運。

sentences.english: Hera promised him the status of lord of Europe and Asia for the apple.
sentences.chinese: 赫拉答應給他的歐洲和亞洲主爲蘋果的地位。

sentences.english: Horace and the Gorgons gossip on the horrible Halloween.
sentences.chinese: 赫拉斯和蛇發女怪三姐妹在可怕的萬聖節前夕聊八卦。

sentences.english: Little had he thought that the old woman was just Hera herself .
sentences.chinese: 他並未想到此老婆婆竟然是赫拉本人。

sentences.english: Hera is the most beautiful of the immortals. Her symbols were the peacock and the cow.
sentences.chinese: 赫拉是衆神中最美麗的女神，她的象徵是孔雀和母牛。

sentences.english: The people had been headed from Nimruz to Herat in western Afghanistan as part of a wedding party.
sentences.chinese: 人們從尼姆魯茲到阿富汗西部的赫拉特去參加婚禮。

sentences.english: Liverpool are set to outbid West Ham United for Lazio midfielder Valon Behrami.
sentences.chinese: 利物浦在對貝赫拉米的出價上擊敗了西漢姆聯。

sentences.english: Then she left the cow to the care of a hundred eyed monster, Argus.
sentences.chinese: 赫拉便將牛犢託付給百眼魔鬼阿剛斯看管。

sentences.english: They told me, Heraclitus , they told me you were dead.
sentences.chinese: 他們告訴我，赫拉克利特，他們說你已經死去。

sentences.english: One man, Heracles of Athens emerged as its undisputed leader.
sentences.chinese: 一個名叫赫拉克利斯的人衆望所歸成爲雅典領袖。

sentences.english: Stacey Herald is dancing with her husband.
sentences.chinese: 赫拉爾德與高大的丈夫一起跳舞。

sentences.english: Did the education Monongahela offered make all these miracles possible?
sentences.chinese: 莫諾戈赫拉提供的教育可能製造奇蹟麼？

sentences.english: Hera, Zeus' wife, and also his sister, was very upset.
sentences.chinese: 赫拉，宙斯的妻子，也是他的姐姐，非常氣憤。

sentences.english: Grand theft auto, larceny, robbery, arson, and suspected of murder in Oklahoma.
sentences.chinese: 偷車，盜竊，搶劫，縱火額赫拉荷馬州謀殺嫌犯。

sentences.english: Marble statue of Hera greets visitors at the entrance.
sentences.chinese: 一尊大理石赫拉像站立在入口出迎接着參觀者。

sentences.english: Maybe Hera was ahead of her time after all.
sentences.chinese: 或許赫拉終究還是太超前於她的時代了。

definition: Poseidon, God of the sea in Greek mythology
Aesop (trad. 620-560 BC), Greek slave and storyteller, supposed author of Aesop's fables
Gaea, the Earth Goddess and mother of the Titans
